com.localore.localore.modelManipulation

Class ExerciseControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.localore.localore.modelManipulation.ExerciseControl

  • public class ExerciseControl
extends java.lang.Object
    Static class for exercise related operations (manipulate the database).

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      • MIN_NO_GEO_OBJECTS_IN_AN_EXERCISE

        public static final int MIN_NO_GEO_OBJECTS_IN_AN_EXERCISE
        An area containing less objects than this is not allowed for an exercise.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MAX_NO_GEO_OBJECTS_IN_A_LEVEL

        public static final int MAX_NO_GEO_OBJECTS_IN_A_LEVEL
        Max number of geo-objects in a level. If more: split into two levels.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • interruptAcquisition

        public static volatile boolean interruptAcquisition
        If true: stops acquiring and exits with exception.

      • acquireGeoObjects

        public static void acquireGeoObjects(NodeShape workingArea,
                                     AppDatabase tempDb,
                                     android.content.Context context)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     LocaUtils.WorkInterruptedException
        Fetches geo-objects in the working-area of exercise. Processes raw OSM. Updates database with geo-objects. They all have quizId -1.
        Parameters:
        workingArea - Area containing objects.
        context - For reading conversion-table from file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        LocaUtils.WorkInterruptedException

      • postProcessing

        public static int postProcessing(long exerciseId,
                                 AppDatabase tempDb,
                                 AppDatabase mainDb)
        Parameters:
        exerciseId - Parent of created quizzes.
        tempDb -
        mainDb -
        Returns:
        N.o geo-objects in the new exercise.

      • dedupeAndInsertGeoObjects

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Long> dedupeAndInsertGeoObjects(AppDatabase src,
                                                                       AppDatabase dest)
        Dedupe geo-objects in src-db and insert into dest-db. Src-db is emptied and closed. Dedupe: Attempt to merge object-pieces into one object. Same (similar) name + close proximity -> merge.
        Parameters:
        src -
        dest -
        Returns:
        IDs of the geo-objects inserted into dest.

      • boostGeoObjectRanksByLength

        public static void boostGeoObjectRanksByLength(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> ids,
                                               AppDatabase db)
        Increase rank of long/big geo-objects in db.
        Parameters:
        ids - IDs of geo-objects to process.
        db -

      • groupEquallySizedLevels

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.Long>> groupEquallySizedLevels(java.util.List<java.lang.Long> goIds)
        Group geo-objects into levels. Attempt equally sized groups, obeying defined constraints.
        Parameters:
        goIds - Geo-object ids sorted by rank.
        Returns:
        Geo-objects grouped into levels. Equally sized groups if possible.

      • wipeConstruction

                                    android.content.Context context)

        Parameters:
        exerciseId -
        context -

      • wipeConstructionJunk

        public static void wipeConstructionJunk(android.content.Context context)
        Wipe temp-construction-data: - Everything in the temp-database. - Geo-objects with -1 quiz-reference (which new geo-objects have at a point during post-processing).
        Parameters:
        context -
